text: @realDonaldTrump Many of my African American friends?? You mean Ben, and maybe Kanye? No.. you’re handlers told you that the blow-back was too much and you needed to change the date or risk pissing off even some of your stupidest followers. Oh, and good luck with the COVID-19 outbreak...
